title: windows vista unable to open downloader
body:
I am trying to get lol onto my friends computer, he has a vista 64 bit. after downloading the installer the program wont open, i have tried to redownload and restart my computer several times. i dont know what to do to fix this problem ive tried runing it as an admin and just opening it, neather worked. ive been searching threw several threads and none help or are relivent to my problem. plz assist i want to play with him soon.
just a {{champion:37}} main

replies.body: Hmmmm typically if a program refuses to open it's because Windows itself doesn't recognize it and blocks it from opening in case it's a virus. Normally we can fix it pretty easily by updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), but let me know if those steps don't seem to help!
